Class.ClassComment: EnginePreparedStatement /** * Additional methods the embedded engine exposes on its PreparedStatement object implementations. An internal api only, mainly for the network server. Allows consistent interaction between embedded PreparedStatement and Brokered PreparedStatements. (DERBY-1015) */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Get the version of the prepared statement. If this has not been changed, the caller may assume that a recompilation has not taken place, i.e. meta-data are (also) unchanged. * @return version counter */
